n=int(input())
for _ in range(n):
    m=int(input())
    lis=list(map(int,input().strip().split()))
    res=[]
    for ele in lis:
        if ele%6==0:
            res.append(6)
        res.append(ele%6)
    print(sum(res))

for _ in range(int(sys.stdin.readline())):
	n = int(sys.stdin.readline())

	for i in range(len(lis)):
		if lis[i]%6 == 0:
			lis[i] = 6
		else:
			lis[i] = lis[i]%6
	#print(lis)
	print(sum(lis))

# cook your dish here
testcases = int(input())
for x in range(testcases):
    size = int(input())
    li = list(map(int,input().split()))
    li2 = [n-(6*(n//6)) if n%6!=0 else 6 for n in li ]
    print(sum(li2))

# cook your dish here
n=int(input())
for _ in range(n):
    k=int(input())
    a=[int(i) for i in input().split()]
    sum=0
    for i in range(k):
        if(a[i]%6==0):
            sum+=6
            continue
        a[i]=a[i]%6
        sum+=a[i]
    #print(a)
    print(sum)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n=int(input())
    arr=list(map(lambda x:int(x)%6, input().split()))
    ans=sum(arr)
    ans+=6*arr.count(0)
    print(ans)
